definitions.definition: The long, projecting nose , mouth , and jaw of a beast, as of pigs.
examples: The pig rooted around in the dirt with its snout .

definitions.definition: The front of the prow of a ship or boat.

examples: His glasses kept slipping further down onto his prominent snout .

definitions.definition: The nozzle of a pipe , hose , etc.
examples: If you place the snout right into the bucket, it won't spray as much.

definitions.definition: The anterior prolongation of the head of a gastropod ; a rostrum .
The anterior prolongation of the head of weevils and allied beetles ; a rostrum .
A butterfly in the nymphalid subfamily Libytheinae , notable for the snout-like elongation on their heads.

main_definition: The long, projecting nose , mouth , and jaw of a beast, as of pigs.
secondary_definitions: The front of the prow of a ship or boat. [First attested in 1387.]
The nozzle of a pipe , hose , etc.
The anterior prolongation of the head of a gastropod ; a rostrum .
The anterior prolongation of the head of weevils and allied beetles ; a rostrum .
A butterfly in the nymphalid subfamily Libytheinae , notable for the snout-like elongation on their heads.
